body_html:
@byronyi Thanks for raising the endian-ness issue. It will probably improve the portability.

If one of the nodes in the cluster is linux (little endian) and another is hp-ux (big endian), for example, then there may be problems. If the cluster is homogeneous, then there should be no issue.
body_text:

body:
@byronyi Thanks for raising the endian-ness issue. It will probably improve the portability. 

If one of the nodes in the cluster is linux (little endian) and another is hp-ux (big endian), for example, then there may be problems. If the cluster is homogeneous, then there should be no issue.
